Title: Patek Philippe & Co.  Stainless Steel Wristwatch. Engraved Movement
Subtitle: Antique 150 years Years Old Movement in New Case.
Description: Movement: Patek Philippe & Co.(100% Authenticity guaranteed) Serial Number: 26180 Case : New stainless steel. Case Diameter : 45 mm. Crystal Type : Domed,mineral glass. Dial : Restored. Strap: Leather For Your attention great looking man's wrist watch converted from pocket watch with very early high grade PATEK PHILIPPE & Co. pocket watch chronometer movement. The movement was engraved by highly skilled jeweler. New stainless steel case with movable swing lugs and crystal back recently made for this wonderful movement. The diameter of the watch is 45 millimeters and 68millimeters from lug to lug and 14 millimeters thick. Professionally skeletonized dial signed PATEK PHILIPPE & Cie, GENEVA, is in perfect condition. Stem wind/set movement is signed PATEK PHILIPPE & Co, GENEVE. The serial number 26180 dates this movement to the year of 1867. High grade engraved and gilded 15 jewels movement has wolf teeth winding gears, counter poised " moustache" lever, bimetallic compensating balance wheel with gold screws, Breguet overcoil balance spring . Watch is serviced and oiled and is in good working condition and keeps good time. The watch comes in a new wooden display box with a new 20 mm black leather strap.
